item.description: 23-03-2025 Blog Setup with hugo in Ubuntu (Linux) From Mark Down (.md) file into website Required to be installed Go, Git, DartSass First open terminal & Install git and go sudo apt update && sudo apt install git golang-go -y Getting started Install hugo from the official website. Download from here Then check the version if you have download it correctly by typing hugo version
